definition: flower bud/young flower still tightly rolled up

sentences.english: The bud develops into a flower.
sentences.chinese: 蓓蕾會漸漸發育成爲花朵。

sentences.english: Like the pulsing life of the neighbourhood, like buds, determined to bloom, like the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 就像那至高無上的生命的近鄰，像蓓蕾取決於綻放。

sentences.english: Major League Baseball Commissioner Bud Selig rejected the deal.
sentences.chinese: 職業棒球大聯盟代表團成員蓓蕾塞利格拒絕交易。

sentences.english: A blossom develops from a bud.
sentences.chinese: 花朵是從蓓蕾孕育而開放的。

sentences.english: The bud may have a bitt er taste, but sweet will be the flower.
sentences.chinese: 蓓蕾也許有苦味，可花朵卻是甜蜜的。

sentences.english: Is it true that my lips are candied like the aperture bud of the aboriginal acquainted love?
sentences.chinese: 我的脣兒，是真像覺悟的初戀的蓓蕾那樣香甜麼？

sentences.english: NO: it is not yours to open buds into blossoms.
sentences.chinese: 不，催蓓蕾開花，那可由不得你。

sentences.english: The opening bud to heaven conveyed.
And still more, later flowers for the bees.
sentences.chinese: 讓越來越多過季的花兒結上蓓蕾。

sentences.english: I was the Bud Girl, for Christ’s sake.
sentences.chinese: 在耶穌的看來，我是蓓蕾女孩。

sentences.english: From my wings are shaken the dews that waken The sweet buds every one.
sentences.chinese: 從我的翅膀上搖落下露珠，去喚醒每一朵香甜的蓓蕾。

sentences.english: Is it true that my lips are sweet like the opening bud of the first conscious love？
sentences.chinese: 我的脣兒，是真像覺醒的初戀的蓓蕾那樣香甜麼？

sentences.english: The dogwood bud , pale green is inlaid with russet markings.
sentences.chinese: 山茱萸的蓓蕾，淡綠清雅，點綴着褐色斑痕。

definition: (of a woman, a flower etc) delicate colors
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
(of a plant) to be in bud
Shuangfeng county in Loudi 婁底|娄底[Lou2 di3], Hunan/(Tw) Twin Peaks, US television drama series 1990-1991
